short_summary: Request for Standing Offer: Seeking offerors to provide labour, materials and equipment to pump and transfer or dispose of raw or partially treated wastewater and/or sewage.
description: This request for standing offers (RFSO) seeks to provide all labour, materials and equipment required to pump and transfer or pump and dispose of raw or partially treated wastewater and/or sewage (i.e. septic holding tanks, sewage lift stations), grease interceptors, and other similar materials from various areas throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton and its satellite locations.
duration_in_months: W6888-245039 Septic and Grease Clean Outs (B)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## W6888-245039 Septic and Grease Clean Outs (B)

### Notice Information

*   **Reference Number:** WS4487100439
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-03-20
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-03T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-03-27

### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4487100439
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Belleville

### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity Information

*   **End User Entities Name:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **End User Entities Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Scott, Jason (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Contact Information Website:** Ariba Discovery

### Tender Description

Canada is seeking offers to provide labour, materials, and equipment required for the pumping and transfer or pumping and disposal of raw or partially treated wastewater and/or sewage, grease interceptors, and other similar materials from various areas within Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton and its satellite locations.

Only bids submitted before 14:00 EDT on April 3, 2024, will be considered responsive. Both online and paper bids will not be accepted after the closing time of 14:00 OST.

You must meet the requirements outlined in the tender description to be considered for this contract. To learn more about the solicitation and to find the tender documents, visit the
